title: Is there a chance at Elise and Zyra merch (and Project: Ashe?)
body:
First and foremost, apologies if posting in the wrong board, rarely post on these.

I really like the cute Special Edition figures Riot has made, and would really love to see one of Dragon Sorceress Zyra and Blood Moon Elise with the levels of adorable that Firecracker Jinx brought (and Gentleman Gnar did as well).

I'd love to see those two in future releases to display them on my desk along with a cool Project: Ashe figure if you guys decide to expand on your "Project:" Figures.

replies.body: Oooooo those two Zyra and Elise figures would be pretty epic!! Not gonna lie, I really want them myself now xD!!! I can't say for sure, simply because I don't have any info on upcoming merch items, but you can be the first to know by checking out our merch site and [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) from time to time!

Why isn't there a forum for just Riot Merch alone? Because I would love to request a Caitlyn figure as a good, cheaper alternative compare to her statue (which I would love to own someday). 

Right now, the closes thing to a Caitlyn figure is the mystery Funko pop box. That took me five tries to find her, along with Morgana.
